fields.text: Thank you for calling Postmates San Francisco, powering fast, on-demand local deliveries from any merchant.
For order status and tracking, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a customer support specialist for your order status.
For payment and billing questions, press '[INDEX]'.

For merchant and partner inquiries, press '[INDEX]'.
